cause.description:
All branches of UCF's SGA uniting.
*This was inspired by a conversation that took place in the SGA office*
*Invite other members of SGA!!!*
1. We want to unite all branches of SGA at UCF.
2. Promote joint social events between all branches.
3. Promote joint programming among all branches.
cause.mission: Unite all branches of SGA at UCF.
cause.name: SGA UNITE!!! (UCF)
